com.atoito.clap.impl

Class GroovierFlattenConfigurationReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.atoito.clap.impl.GroovierFlattenConfigurationReader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ConfigurationReader

    public class GroovierFlattenConfigurationReader
extends java.lang.Object
implements ConfigurationReader
    Default configuration reader component. It reads configurations in groovy files (using internally a ConfigSlurper) and store them in a flat map.
